data.name: Fraction Operation Misunderstanding
data.description: Student applies incorrect operations when working with fractions
examples: Multilied fractions incorrectly: 1/2 × 1/3 = 1/6 but thought it was 1/5
data.subject: fractions

data.name: Percentage Calculation Error
data.description: Student incorrectly calculates percentages or confuses percentage concepts
examples: Thought 50% increase means multiply by 0.5 instead of 1.5
Calculated 20% of 100 as 20 but couldn't reverse the calculation
data.subject: percentages

data.name: Slope-Intercept Conceptual Error
data.description: Student fundamentally misunderstands slope and intercept relationships
examples: Believed steeper lines always have larger y-intercepts
Thought negative slope means the line goes downward left-to-right regardless of equation
data.subject: algebra
